word_mean: 水与强酸标准溶液定量作用至一定pH值的能力。单位以CaCO3mg/L表示。

sentence.Network_en: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 在白垩质土壤中添加有机物可降低其碱性。

sentence.Network_en: A pH test measures the acidity or alkalinity of a substance.
sentence.Network_cn: pH值测试可检测物质的酸碱度。

sentence.Network_en: As a result, soil alkalinity rose and farmland lay barren.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果, 土壤中的碱份增多,农田成了不毛之地.

entry.def: Something that is alkaline contains an alkali or has a pH value of more than 7.

example.ex: Some soils are actually too alkaline for certain plant life.
example.tran: 有些土壤其实碱性过强，不利于某些植物生长。
